WorkItem.Description:
I am trying to run Rawr on Windows XP x64 and am getting errors before I can get in the program. I have the x64 versions of ,NET installed. Here is the message I'm getting:
 
System.Security.SecurityException was unhandled
Message: Request for the permission of type 'System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission, mscorlib, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089' failed.
 
I have other .NET apps working such as Paint.NET and the Wowaceupdater. Is this a Rawr issue or Windows XP x64 issue?
WorkItem.Summary: Rawr on Windows XP x64 crashing on load.

Comments.Message: Have not seen this issue before... Is Rawr running from a location that you have full permissions to?
I use XP x64 and have never seen this problem so I don't think its x64 specific. I'd check folder permissions, etc.
I fixed it. I tried to run Rawr from a network share thats drive mapped. I do have full read/write acces to the shre tho. I just copied Rawr to my hard drive and its working now.
